publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-478# Mary Mulligan: Congratulations to Julia Cross, Taekwon-do World Champion—That the Parliament congratulates Julia Cross from Bathgate on winning the International Taekwon-do Federation World Championship in the 58 kilo free sparring class and recognises that, as this is Julia’s sixth world championship, she is now the most decorated International Taekwon-do Federation person in the world and, as such, is a great ambassador for Scotland and a fantastic role model for young people, particularly those for whom she runs classes.

S3M-478# Congratulations to Julia Cross, Taekwon-do World Champion (lodged on 14 September 2007) Bill Kidd*, Jim Hume*, Nanette Milne*, Bashir Ahmad*, Iain Gray*, Angela Constance*, Des McNulty*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-478# Congratulations to Julia Cross, Taekwon-do World Champion (lodged on 14 September 2007) Jackie Baillie*, Karen Gillon*, Elaine Murray*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S3M-478# Congratulations to Julia Cross, Taekwon-do World Champion (lodged on 14 September 2007) Hugh Henry*
S3M-478# Congratulations to Julia Cross, Taekwon-do World Champion (lodged on 14 September 2007) Ken Macintosh*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-478# Congratulations to Julia Cross, Taekwon-do World Champion (lodged on 14 September 2007) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-478# Congratulations to Julia Cross, Taekwon-do World Champion (lodged on 14 September 2007) Jack McConnell*
